title: Poll: Are you going to use Apple’s new Self Service Repair program?
content:
Apple launched its new Self Service Repair program today, which allows iPhone customers in the United States to access parts and manuals that they can use to repair their own devices – starting with iPhone 12, iPhone 13, and iPhone SE 3. Are you going to use this new program?

more…

The post Poll: Are you going to use Apple’s new Self Service Repair program? appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple launched its new Self Service Repair program today, which allows iPhone customers in the U.S. to repair their own devices.
